annotations.description: It's Fall People! And that means coffee cocktails! We're stoked to be sponsored by Mr. Black Coffee Liqueur! For those Barfly fans you'll know that Mr. Black...
annotations.title: Five Favorite Coffee Cocktails feat. Mr. Black

textContent:
1oz (30ml) Coffee Liqueur
1oz (30ml) Black Strap Rum
.75oz (22.5ml) Simple Syrup
.5oz (15ml) Heavy Cream
1 Egg Yolk
Grated Nutmeg Garnish 

Dry shake then shake with ice
Double strain into rocks glass

title: Cafe Con Leche Flip
